candidate Profile Description.summary: Data Science and Software Engineering professional with experience in developing products for Advanced Driving Assistance Systems at Continental AG and writing technical blogs for TowardsAI and Stackademic. Skilled in machine learning algorithms, deep learning, data mining, time series analysis, and software development with expertise in Python, R, C, SQL, MongoDB, and various ML and DL frameworks.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering, Electrical and Electronics

projects.title: Ezflow.ai
projects.description: Leading the development of EzFlow.ai, a user-friendly platform designed to empower users with no coding experience to learn and implement machine learning projects. By automating data preprocessing, model training, and result visualization, EzFlow.ai provides users with predictions and comprehensive summary reports.

projects.title: Quora Question Pair Similarity
projects.description: Applied Natural Language Processing techniques to determine if two questions have similar meaning. Performed comprehensive data analysis, feature engineering, and text data featurization to develop a predictive model.

projects.title: New York City Taxi Trip Duration Prediction
projects.description: Developed a model for predicting trip duration using New York City pick-up and drop-off coordinates, involving extensive data cleaning, analysis, and training various ML models, achieving the lowest RMSE of 224 seconds.

projects.title: Sentiment Prediction from Amazon Reviews
projects.description: Developed a model to predict if a text review of a product given by a user is positive or negative. Performed extensive text cleaning and featurizing text data, achieved an AUC score of 0.90 using SGD Classifier. Deployed using Flask on AWS EC-2 virtual machine.

research_publications.title: Facial Feature Extraction and Emotional Analysis Using ML
Performance Comparison of Prediction Algorithms for Forecasting of Wind Power Generation

work_experience.title: Technical Writer
responsibilities: Authored engaging technical blogs focused on Artificial Intelligence and Autonomous Cars.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Worked on Advanced Driving Assistance Systems and developed products like Emergency Brake Assist and Rear Pre-Crash Predict.
Developed algorithm using C and implemented automation using Python scripting.
Delivered better performance with just 2 false positives per 10,000 kilometers, optimizing key performance indicators.
Major products: Volkswagen ID Buzz and Mercedes Benz Sprinter Van.

work_experience.title: Data Science Intern
responsibilities: Collaborated with a dynamic team to conduct in-depth data analysis utilizing Python and Tableau, providing valuable insights into client's sales data.
Formulated data-driven recommendations and compelling narratives and communicated to our client.

work_experience.title: Intern
responsibilities: Worked on validation and verification process standards in avionics hardware.
Collaborated with different teams and reviewed standards of all the validation and verification processes.
